title: Yankees ace Cole will have Tommy John surgery
description: On Tuesday in Los Angeles, Yankees right-hander Gerrit Cole will undergo Tommy John surgery, the team announced, ending his season before it began and leaving New York staggering from another blow as it prepares to defend its American League pennant.
author: Jorge Castillo

title: Sources: Rams to release Kupp if no trade made
description: The Los Angeles Rams plan to release wide receiver Cooper Kupp when the NFL's new season starts March 12 if they are unable to find a trade partner, sources told ESPN's Adam Schefter on Monday.

title: 'Some Man Utd players not good enough & overpaid'
description: Some Manchester United players are "not good enough" and some are "overpaid", the club's co-owner Sir Jim Ratcliffe tells BBC sports editor Dan Roan.

title: Who has made Troy's Premier League team of the week?
description: After every round of Premier League matches this season, Troy Deeney gives us his team of the week. Do you agree with his choices?

title: Live updates: Tracking all the moves as NFL's tampering window opens
description: Seattle made Sam Darnold a $100M man, rivals are raiding Philly's roster, and Josh Allen is getting some help after getting paid. Here's the latest.
author: Yahoo Sports

title: Jaguars reportedly signing former Commanders WR Dyami Brown
description: Jacksonville adds a needed weapon on offense.
author: Yahoo Sports

title: Mistakes, overpaid players and plan for success - Ratcliffe's Man Utd verdict
description: Manchester United co-owner Sir Jim Ratcliffe has given his verdict on key issues around the club and his leadership of it in a series of wide-ranging interviews. Here's what we've learnt...

title: Ratcliffe: Sticking with Ten Hag a mistake but Amorim doing 'excellent job'
description: Manchester United co-owner Sir Jim Ratcliffe says it was a mistake not to sack Erik ten Hag in the summer â€“ but has praised the "excellent job" current head coach Ruben Amorim is doing.
